fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Investigate a player and recieve a list of 3 Rolelist Slots. One of them is the player's correct slot. At least one will always be some kind of a Town Slot, as long as the Rolelist has Town Slots.
- Investigate a player to learn precisely which Rolelist Slot they are in.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may only learn a player's exact Rolelist Slot once.
- This role cannot roll if the Rolelist is All/Any.
